title: How is the CMR Institute of Technology for information science? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Department of Information Science & Engineering, CMRIT established in the year 2000, offers an undergraduate program in Information Science & Engineering under the affiliation of Visvesvaraya Technological University, Belgaum. The department is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi and is permanently affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU), Belgaum in Karnataka. The National Board of Accreditation (NBA) has accredited the department in the year 2008 with re-accreditation in 2012, 2017 and in subsequently in 2020. The department has excellent hardware and software resources. The department has classrooms equipped with projectors. The department faculties excel in teaching and various research areas. The faculty is committed to achieving, sustaining and fostering unmatched excellence in technical education. Along with VTU’s curriculum, the department gives equal emphasis on both theoretical and experimental hands-on learning in Information Technology. The department regularly organizes various activities like industry visits, technical talks, and real-time projects to hone the students’ technical skills and personality development. The department also supports the students in equipping them with industry-ready skills by conducting various workshops and training related to placements. The department actively encourages the students with student-centric activities by providing them with job-ready training from basic to advanced level. All eligible students are placed in high profile companies with good packages.
